In that day there shall be a fountain opened to the house of David and to the inhabitants of Jerusalem for sin and for uncleanness.<RF>uncleanness: Heb. separation for uncleanness<Rf>

And it shall come to pass in that day, saith the LORD of hosts, <FI>that<Fi> I will cut off the names of the idols out of the land, and they shall no more be remembered: and also I will cause the prophets and the unclean spirit to pass out of the land.

And it shall come to pass, <FI>that<Fi> when any shall yet prophesy, then his father and his mother that begat him shall say unto him, Thou shalt not live; for thou speakest lies in the name of the LORD: and his father and his mother that begat him shall thrust him through when he prophesieth.

And it shall come to pass in that day, <FI>that<Fi> the prophets shall be ashamed every one of his vision, when he hath prophesied; neither shall they wear a rough garment to deceive:<RF>a roughâ€¦: Heb. a garment of hair<Rf><RF>deceive: Heb. lie<Rf>
But he shall say, I <FI>am<Fi> no prophet, I <FI>am<Fi> an husbandman; for man taught me to keep cattle from my youth.
And <FI>one<Fi> shall say unto him, What <FI>are<Fi> these wounds in thine hands? Then he shall answer, <FI>Those<Fi> with which I was wounded <FI>in<Fi> the house of my friends.<CM>

Awake, O sword, against my shepherd, and against the man <FI>that is<Fi> my fellow, saith the LORD of hosts: smite the shepherd, and the sheep shall be scattered: and I will turn mine hand upon the little ones.
And it shall come to pass, <FI>that<Fi> in all the land, saith the LORD, two parts therein shall be cut off <FI>and<Fi> die; but the third shall be left therein.

And I will bring the third part through the fire, and will refine them as silver is refined, and will try them as gold is tried: they shall call on my name, and I will hear them: I will say, It <FI>is<Fi> my people: and they shall say, The LORD <FI>is<Fi> my God.<CM>
